item.title: bulk RNA-seq(3):Trim the read files using trim_galore
item.description: Tip We will install Trim Galore and trim the merged read files to improve the quality of our data.

item.title: bulk RNA-seq(2):Quality Control with FastQC and MultiQC
item.description: FastQC for Quality Checks FastQC provides a simple way to perform quality control checks on raw sequence data.
